general.FMR:
Hi,

Thank you for contacting Google Cloud Platform Support, my name is [Your Name] and I will assist you today.

As I understood from your message,  [ISSUE UNDERSTANDING]
Please let me know if there are any misunderstandings in my statement, or if there's any important detail left out. Any other information you may provide will be welcomed.

Please help me understand the business impact to ensure we have the right amount of resources focused on this issue. A good context would be if there is a risk to critical deadlines, number of users affected, or additional details relevant to you.          

[INVESTIGATION]

Please, don't hesitate to contact me if you have any more questions as I will be very glad to help.

If you may prefer, we can schedule a Google Meet Live session to discuss this topic. I would need to know your availability before creating the Meet room during my earliest time slot available, so please do not hesitate to let me know if you are interested.

I'll be looking forward to your response.

Best regards,

[Your Name] 
Google Cloud Platform Support, Tel-Aviv 
Working Hours: Sun-Thu 10:00 - 17:00 Jerusalem Timezone (UTC +2)
